title: Warner Bros & Discovery | Senior Software Engineer | Hyderabad
content:
* Education: B.Tech Computer Science
* Years of Experience: 5
* Prior Experience: SSE at Travel Domain Company
* Date of the Offer: July, 2024
* Company: Warner Bros & Discovery
* Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
* Location: Hyderabad
* Current Salary: Rs 23,00,000
* Salary: Rs 35,00,000
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: 4 Lakhs
* Stock bonus: NA
* Bonus: 15% of Fixed ~ 5,25,000
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus): 44,25,000 (1st year), then 40,25,000 from 1st year onwards
* Benefits: As usual
* Other details: Initially, they lowballed me, offering around a 30% increase on my current fixed salary, but I rejected it. Then they came back with the same number I had quoted. However, by that time, I had received another offer that they couldn’t match, as their maximum budget was what they had already offered me.
